p: The majority of patients with DENV were from Karachi (87.1%, n = 149), followed by Hyderabad (6.4%, n = 11) ( Table 1). Karachi was also the site for most of the CHIKV positive cases (91%, n = 89), then Hyderabad (5.05%, n = 5) ( Table 1). Upper Sindh showed less activity for both DENV and CHIKV infection with only 4% of DENV patients from Mirpurkhas and 1% from each Sukkhar and Larkana. For CHIKV infection, 2% of patients were enrolled from Sukkhar and 1% each from Mirpurkhas and Larkana.
